website_summaries.verdict: Dora’s friends Map and Backpack are essential accessories for pretend playtime, and the plush purple pack is a charming and soft toy that little fans will enjoy.
pros: Includes toy Map and Backpack characters
Map rolls out to display illustration
cons: Backpack is best for light use

customer_reviews.title: Huge mark up
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. The map is pretty neat. This item at $30 is a little much for what you get. Other companies sell it for $11 but had run out when it came time for me to order. If you plan ahead order it directly from China instead of purchasing it from a company who pre-purchased it and is marking the price up 3 fold. Other than than, the item served it’s purchase for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for the dora obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Ive Looked everywhere for a map that was actally a map and not just blank. I found it! We did it! It has all the characters included on the map(even the map). They are good material and stand up great to playful toddlers. They love map and backpack. If you have a dora fanatic these toys wont let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my 2 year old granddaughter. When we received it last night, this is how it looked when we opened the package. It looks as if someone tied a knot on one strap instead of giving us a backpack that is fully operable. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a dora fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack with soft foldable map. Onlt negative is the straps are not traditional backpack "type" straps just nylon straps.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just like the cartoon
customer_reviews.text: We actually got this for a Halloween costume. the quality was great and it was just like the cartoon. Well worth the money and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My granddaughter plays with this all of the time. Even wears it out in the neighborhood exploring with her map!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my Dora obsessed 2 year old!!! She takes the map out and reads it!! Material is sooo soft!! Adjustable shoulder straps!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. No cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Face is embroidered on so it's not cheaply made like others I've seen. See has so much fun with her backpack and the map.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack & map!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Dora and this backpack & map are amazing! Super soft, easy to use (she's an autistic toddler and has no problem opening & closing the backpack), I love the drawstring that can keep her stuff in the bag & the map is adorable, love the pictures on it. =)
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Jackson-Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it lol. The material seems pretty sturdy and soft and the design has a lot of details that makes my bae go over the moon. She loves the map and I think I finally bought a toy that she's gonna play with consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Nvader Blue

customer_reviews.title: it was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to a 3 year old as a gift and she seemed to be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and love that the map is an actual map inside
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Good size!
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is good size! Very soft and just super cute! Fits about 6 children's books...adorable to gift!
customer_reviews.author: LilOne

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this. It's much better quality than others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: We love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's an actual sized backpack and that it's machine washable. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The Map... Wow the Map my granddaughter couldn't take her eyes off the map
customer_reviews.text: The Map is the star of the set it actually has a map on the other side.I thought the backpack was a little plusher but its adorable
customer_reviews.author: Christina lynn Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great but fabric a bit ruff
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fabric would be softer but i love it it was a great Halloween costume for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Úna Carton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this for her Halloween costume! The map was a super fun bonus!
customer_reviews.author: juliet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. My 2 year old is in love with it! Looks just like the picture. Comes with a fabric map!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Halloween costume that can be played with afterwards - prefect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sell
customer_reviews.text: We used the backpack for a Halloween party. My boyfriend dressed as Dora and the backpack was perfect for what we needed. The maps pictures were clear it’s got every character on it, we didn’t look at it too closely but it seems every one has two eyes. It was a great size and soft, seems to close properly but I wouldn’t trust it to hold anything too important as it is closed only with a fabric attaching it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to go with my 2.5 year old's Halloween costume and she absolutely loves it! She brings it everywhere now. Perfect size for her little body and holds just enough. Love that it has outside pockets for Map and an extra for her water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: sara reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3yr old granddaughter, can’t wait till Christmas to put under the tree. I also bought Boots and Swiper to put inside so she’ll definitely be excited
customer_reviews.author: laurie k
